name: Adlevo Capital
overview:
Adlevo Capital is a Mauritius-based private equity fund manager founded on the conviction that meaningful development in sub-Saharan Africa will be driven by the increasing application of technology to business processes across all sectors.

We subscribe to a view that places a premium on operating experience, deep networks and an understanding of the nature and evolution of the technology spaces in which we invest.

We actively seek to invest in ambitious companies, hungry for growth, to which we can add significant value through our collective experience, relationships and value-driven approach.

Adlevo Capital was established to capitalize on the growing demand for infrastructure and services in sub-Saharan Africa. We focus on technology-enabled opportunities, which benefit from increased buying power of consumers. We believe that the application of technology to the provision of infrastructure and services is an essential determinant of sustainable social development outcomes and will generate compelling returns for investors.
